content: i present to you my latest novelty a plush monkey made of premium yarn get ready to create your adorable teddy girlfriend with my free pattern video available on my amigurumi youtube channel with gunes_orgu video with written english text the design of this adorable monkey is perfect for masters of any level of training and a step-by-step guide will help you easily master it whether you are an experienced knitter or just starting out you will enjoy bringing this cute character to life join the fun and start creating your own stuffed monkey today materials yarn wolans bunny baby 100g-120m 3 53 oz- 131yds 100% super soft polyester shades brown light brown alize cotton gold 100g-330m 3 53 oz-361yds 55% cotton 45% acrylic crochet hook size 3 5 mm = n6 safety eyes 12mm fiber needle tailor pins scissors
